mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jaso VALUES((SELECT nvl(max(jaso_no)+1, 1) from jaso), #{jaso_schPart}, #{jaso_field}, #{jaso_title}, #{jaso_contents})

INSERT INTO empinfo VALUES((SELECT nvl(max(eno)+1, 1) from empinfo), #{companyName}, #{title}, #{href}, #{clasificar}, #{subclass}, #{career}, #{education}, #{employmentType}, #{work_place}, #{deadlines})
